About

Hello My name is Bibek Adhikari (बिबेक अधिकारी) and I'm a student of Kathmandu,Nepal, currently in Punjab,India for my Btech who loves to design, front-end development and coding a lot.

The name Bibek is pronounced as BeeBek, means mindful or mind in Sanskrit

Let's be friends

Join me on the following networks and/or websites

Writing content is a matter of work. Sometimes it requires more than a night to write a content, but making design is fun. I made Bibek's Blog so I would be able to do both.

About the Site

In this site you will find a collection of how to's more than other articles. Most of them related to either C, HTML, CSS or C++ and more will be followed as I learn myself how to do them.

In case you were wondering, this site is:

  • Designed and developed on Kali OS
  • Developed with Atom
  • Built on Jekyll, the open source static site generator

    • If you enjoy the content found here, you might like to subscribe to my feed. Also feel free to send me any feedback, comments, or suggestions about the site.
